experience.title: Co Founder
experience.description: We are a venture-backed, product SaaS startup that has completed its Pre-Series A round led by Pentathlon Ventures, 9Unicorns, IAN & prominent angels. Recognized as one of the top 100 edtech companies in India and South Asia by HolonIQ, we are the most preferred admissions and marketing automation Education CRM. With a pan India presence, we help admission teams increase, manage & predict their admissions!You can learn more about our award-winning Sales & Marketing Automation Software here:

publications: [{"title":"Patent: SYSTEM TO BUILD, AGGREGATE & SEARCH VIRTUAL SOCIAL DATASETS FROM DYNAMIC DATABASES","subtitle":"THE PATENTS ACT, 1970 | THE PATENT RULES, 2006 | PROVISIONAL SPECIFICATION","date":"July 16, 2015","description":"The objectives of the technology described as a part of the provisional patent are as follows: Provide a search mechanism for information retrieval from multiple data networks viz primarily social networks. Build a normalized “virtual dynamic profile” data that is created from several data networks by linking them with their online behaviour, preferences, interests & footprints on these very multiple data networks; Provide a search procedures for profiles in multiple data networks; and Provide data filtration, predictive analytics, patterns and selection proceduresfor profile data stored in multiple networks."}]
